instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Macbook Air 13 inch with M2 chip 2022 year 820-02536-09 water damaged only 5v
threads.message:
hello dear members

i have in hand Macbook Air 13 inch with M2 chip 2022 year 820-02536-09 water damaged only 5v 

main problems: 1)i can't find shematic and brd for this model. 2) i don't have donor  board for this model

if any one have any of them please help me to find out name and values of damaged parts

threads.title: Macbook Air 13 inch with M2 chip 2022 year 820-02536-09 water damaged only 5v
threads.message:
Nothing available yet for this model.
Very likely time wasting in this case.
You can try to identify the chips (by marking code) and may find some schematics using them, or datasheets (less probably).

threads.message:

if anyone have donor/icloud locked board and helps me to identify parts by marking code will be great. in my case ic is burnt and can't identify

thanks
